name: AIVA
description: AIVA is an AI-powered music generation platform that creates original compositions for various creative projects.
longDescription: AIVA, or Artificial Intelligence Virtual Artist, is a Luxembourg-based platform launched in 2016 that uses AI to compose music for films, games, commercials, and more. Recognized by SACEM as the world’s first virtual composer, AIVA leverages deep learning and reinforcement learning to analyze musical patterns from classical and contemporary works, producing unique compositions in over 250 styles. It serves both amateur and professional creators by offering tools to generate, edit, and customize music tracks quickly. The platform’s mission is to augment human creativity, enabling users to create personalized soundtracks without requiring extensive musical expertise. AIVA supports a collaborative approach, blending AI-generated music with human refinements for high-quality outputs. Its accessibility and versatility make it a valuable tool for content creators, game developers, and filmmakers.
features: Generates original music in over 250 styles, from classical to pop, in seconds, enabling rapid soundtrack creation.
Allows users to upload audio or MIDI files to influence AI-generated compositions, ensuring customized outputs.
Supports editing of generated tracks, giving users control to refine melodies, harmonies, and rhythms.
Offers multiple download formats, including MP3, MIDI, and WAV, for seamless integration into various workflows.
Provides a Pro Plan that grants full copyright ownership, allowing users to monetize compositions without restrictions.
Includes preset style models based on curated datasets, simplifying the creation process for beginners.
Enables creation of custom style models, empowering advanced users to define unique musical characteristics.
Features a desktop app for macOS and Windows, enhancing accessibility and offline functionality.
Supports text prompts for generating personalized chord progressions, streamlining composition workflows.
Integrates with digital audio workstations (DAWs) via MIDI files, facilitating professional music production.
Offers high-quality orchestrated MIDI outputs, reducing manual production time for complex compositions.

faqs.question: What is AIVA used for?
faqs.answer: AIVA is an AI music generation tool that creates original soundtracks for films, games, commercials, and social media content in various styles.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Yes, AIVA offers a free plan for non-commercial use, but users must credit AIVA and cannot monetize the tracks.

faqs.question: Can I own the copyright of music created with AIVA?
faqs.answer: With a Pro Plan subscription, users own full copyright of their compositions, allowing unrestricted monetization.

faqs.question: What music styles can AIVA generate?
faqs.answer: AIVA can compose in over 250 styles, including classical, pop, jazz, cinematic, rock, and exotic genres like Chinese and tango.

faqs.question: How does AIVA generate unique music?
faqs.answer: AIVA uses deep learning to analyze musical patterns and reinforcement learning to create unique compositions based on user inputs or preset styles.

faqs.question: Can I edit the music AIVA generates?
faqs.answer: Yes, AIVA allows users to edit generated tracks, adjusting melodies, harmonies, and rhythms to suit their needs.

faqs.question: What file formats are available for download?
faqs.answer: Users can download compositions in MP3, MIDI, WAV, and text chord formats, supporting various production needs.

faqs.question: Is AIVA suitable for beginners?
faqs.answer: Yes, AIVA’s intuitive interface and preset styles make it accessible for beginners, while advanced features cater to professionals.

faqs.question: Can I use AIVA music for YouTube or social media?
faqs.answer: The Standard Plan allows monetization on YouTube, Twitch, TikTok, and Instagram, while the Pro Plan supports broader commercial use.
